entry.title: Kyiv Faces Lengthier Blackouts as Russia Keeps Up Assault on Ukraine
entry.content: Kyiv residents are facing prolonged blackouts, after Russian airstrikes again hit the Ukrainian electric system overnight, further degrading the country’s ability to keep the lights on.

entry.title: Taiwan Braces for 'Grim' Times After China's Xi Extends Power
entry.content: As Beijing takes tougher line on self-ruled island, the situation ‘could turn quite serious,’ Taiwan defense chief warns.

entry.title: Three Arrests, Two Superpowers and a Secret Prisoner Swap
entry.content: Detention of a Chinese executive to stand trial in the U.S. provoked a standoff between global rivals and opened an acrimonious new era. “You are lapdogs of the United States.”
